title: Tomato and roasted pepper soup
ingredients: ['3 red peppers', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 large tomatoes - peeled, seeded and chopped', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried thyme', '2 teaspoons paprika', 'pinch of sugar', '1½ litres chicken stock', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', 'pinch cayenne pepper', 'dash of chilli sauce', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 ½ tablespoons plain flour', '6 tablespoons soured cream']
